attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE ğŸ˜­by Josh Krakowski
attributes.review: People do not get fooled, this app will steal all of your PokÃ©mon cards and sell them on eBay for only two dollars, horrible price I know. This app has ruined my relationships with my dog and led to my cat eating my hamster while my snake committed suicide with its own body. This app made me squeeze my nipples off my body and into a sandwich of which I ate and then digested. This app then led to Barack Obama evicting me from my own apartment and putting me onto a ranch with no human contact so I had no other choice but to bang a llama. That llama then gave me aids and the only way I stopped it was to chop off my own toes. and it sure is difficult to live without any toes.

But Felt sad because my cookies had ran away because they didnâ€™t want to yeah, I fell up the stairs and accidentally ended up in the attic thatâ€™s in the basement where he keeps the goats from escaping and turning my house into jello but itâ€™s okay because my house is up for sell for 4 fortune cookies of bad luck

attributes.title: This app will unplug your grandmas life support!
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡ I was sitting in the hospital room, next to my dying grandmother. I was scrolling through the apps and I found this one, and I thought, â€œHey! Grandma would like this one!â€ Because â€˜Trumpâ€™ is the first syllable of â€˜Trumpet,â€™ and my grandmother loves trumpets. So I downloaded the app, and it asked for my location, and I agreed. So after showing my grandma the app, a man in a skin suit with the app logo walked into the hospital room and said, â€œPaleontologists will find you someday, fossil,â€ before yanking out the cord on the life support! Grandma died, and we didnâ€™t even want her to! They wonâ€™t cover the funeral costs ğŸ¤¬

attributes.title: yuckâ¤ï¸
attributes.review: HORRIBLE! I got this app thinking that you would get free oranges but NO! All it did was made my pet unicorn in the freezer very angry cause the app was âœ¨TRASHâœ¨ and nothing worked! It also made my phone very glitchy! When I went into it one time, it turned black and all of the sudden James Charles appeared screaming â€œHI SISTERS!â€ I was very scared and threw my phone out the window onto the street, where a moving bus ran over it, hit a tree, caught on fire, and disappeared like my great uncle in 1956. DO NOT get this app unless you want to have to buy a flip phone because your phone got destroyed of being scared by a monstrous creature. I would rate this a 0/10 if I could! ğŸ˜¤ğŸ™„
